name: Mango Haze
description: Mango Haze is a mostly sativa strain bred by Mr. Nice Seeds, who crossed Northern Lights #5, Skunk, and Haze to create this uplifting, fruity variety. Though similar to its sibling strain Super Silver Haze, Mango Haze exhibits a distinctive mango aroma coupled with a buzzing cerebral sensation.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Relaxed, Euphoric, Energetic, Stress, Depression, Pain, Fatigue, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Dizzy, Headache
